subject: JUnit Implementation for an already developed J2EE application
msgSnippet: Hi  Can any one tell me what would be the best approach to implement the Junit testcases for an already developed J2EE  application. I fear that it would be a
messageBody:
Hi '

Can any one tell me what would be the best approach to implement the
Junit testcases
for an already developed J2EE application. I fear that it would be a
redevelopment as we
have to write TestCase classes for all the existing classes( Units ).Is
redevelopment
of the application with the test driven development approach would be
the best solution or
we can implement the JUnit test cases for already exsisting application
? Please reply.

Regards
Pramod
